Package com.mlt.common.lang

Class Strings

java.lang.Object
com.mlt.common.lang.Strings
public class Strings
extends java.lang.Object
String utilities.

    • leftPad

      public static java.lang.String leftPad​(java.lang.Number num, int size)
      Left pad a number. Parent Apache does not work as expected.
      Parameters:
      num - The number to pad out, can not be null.
      size - The size to pad to
      Returns:
      The left padded string.

    • leftPad

      Left pad a number. Parent Apache does not work as expected.
      Parameters:
      num - The number to pad out, can not be null.
      size - The size to pad to
      padStr - The string to pad with.
      Returns:
      The left padded string.

    • leftPad

      public static java.lang.String leftPad​(java.lang.String str, int size)
      Left pad a string. Parent Apache does not work as expected.
      Parameters:
      str - The string to pad out, may be null.
      size - The size to pad to
      Returns:
      The left padded string.

    • leftPad

      public static java.lang.String leftPad​(java.lang.String str, int size, char padChr)
      Left pad a string. Parent Apache does not work as expected.
      Parameters:
      str - The string to pad out, may be null.
      size - The size to pad to
      padChr - The char to pad with.
      Returns:
      The left padded string.

    • leftPad

      public static java.lang.String leftPad​(java.lang.String str, int size, java.lang.String padStr)
      Left pad a string. Parent Apache does not work as expected.
      Parameters:
      str - The string to pad out, may be null.
      size - The size to pad to
      padStr - The string to pad with, null or empty treated as single space.
      Returns:
      The left padded string.
